title.narrative: UN Office for Disarmament Affairs/Conventional Arms Trust Fund support to the implementation of UNPoA UN Saferguard

description.narrative: The assistance contributes to the establishment of the UN SaferGuard Quick Response mechanism. It would allow the UN to provide rapid assistance on managing high-risk ammunition through preventive risk mitigation as well as in disaster situations. Under th e mechanism qualified experts will be on call to rapidly respond to requests to secure nationally held or seized ammunition stockpiles which may pose a danger to civilian populations. Where appropriate the UN SaferGuard Quick Response mechanism will work i n tandem with humanitarian country teams in providing this service. The UN Saferguard Programme is part of the Assistance Portfolio of UN Office of Disarmament Affairs' Conventional Trust Fund. The Fund is aimed to supporting the implementation of the UN P rogramme of Action to Prevent Combat and Eradicate the Illicit Trade in Small and Light Weapons.
